arts.ttl: 35-year-old Diego Lopez named RC Lens sporting director
arts.sum: RC Lens have confirmed the appointment of 35-year-old Diego Lopez as the club’s new sporting director, thus making him one of the youngest sporting directors in Ligue 1. Lopez arrived…

Another stellar weekend of LaLiga action will be headlined by Barcelona's trip to unbeaten Villarreal and Joe Champion has score predictions for that contest and all the other tussles in the Spanish top flight.

arts.ttl: Preview: Valencia vs. Girona - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's La Liga clash between Valencia and Girona, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
